document.full_text: hoyout, iraq  - sitting in his reed meeting house in what was once iraq's marshes, sheikh rashash al-imara warns of potential trouble if his poor tribesmen are driven off their land by foreign companies digging for oil.
document.title: iraqi tribal disputes pose new challenge to oil firms
lines_and_colors: hoyout, iraq  - sitting in his reed meeting house in what was once iraq's marshes, sheikh rashash al-imara warns of potential trouble if his poor tribesmen are driven off their land by foreign companies digging for oil.
